original_body_lines: Tamil National Peoples Front (TNPF) leader and MP Gajendrakumar Ponnambalam who was arrested over an incident in Jaffna between him and the police, was granted bail by the Kilinochchi Magistrate's Court.
The MP was arrested this morning by the officers of Maruthankerni and Jayapuram Police stations.
He was produced before the court after recording a statement.
The Kilinochchi magistrate earlier imposed an overseas travel ban on the MP and ordered him to issue a statement to the Maruthankerni Police.
